facility.name: timer
facility.description: The timer facility has events related to timer events in the kernel.

enum.description: decrements in real time, and delivers SIGALRM upon expiration.
decrements only when the process is executing, and delivers SIGVTALRM upon expiration.

decrements both when the process executes and when the system is executing on behalf of the process. Coupled with ITIMER_VIRTUAL, this timer is usually used to profile the time spent by the application in user and kernel space. SIGPROF is delivered upon expiration.

event.name: expired
event.description: A timer or itimer has expired.

field.name: pid
field.description: PID of the process to wake up.

event.name: softirq
event.description: The timer softirq is currently runned.
